resources.string: Build your own world by iGap right now.
It takes only few minutes to join iGap community!
iGap attaches the utmost importance to your security and privacy using the individual encryption algorithms and guarantees a safe and secure connection between you, your friends and family.
You can have one-on-one or group chats and even create your own channel and add members in order to share information with millions of people.
iLand! without limitation\nwith wonderful events as taking a taxi, pay bills and booking hotels and flights . Oh Also you can play games, watch films and listen to music

You can make thoroughly free and secure voice and video calls to anyone on iGap and save your money. iGap voice and video call is P2P-based with no server\'s interference in voice and video transmission.
Let’s stop waiting! \n iGap is thoroughly free. So, just now build your own world freely.
Leave a new world around me. Around you, find your friends, entertainment centers, art, business and other and enjoy your moments ...
Enter your Nickname and select a photo as your Profile Avatar/Picture

Photos, videos and all other files saved on your cloud storage could be removed from your device in order to free up space. All these removed files and media are stored on cloud storage and could be downloaded and saved again if needed.

Clearing the local database will delete the texts of cached messages and compress the database to save internal disk space. iGap needs some data to work, so database size will not reach zero. \n\n This operation can take few minutes to complete.

Cached data on your device are the uploaded and/or downloaded files as photos, videos or documents, which must be cleared occasionally not to stop your device working or slow it down. Whenever you want to see them again, it is sufficient only to tap on them for downloading.
The location status and other features of map are disabled. To use all the capabilities, turn the switch on first.
You will be visible to others with no status. Are you sure to continue?
Enabling Nearby will result in getting your and others\' status visible to both. Are you sure to continue?
Disabling Nearby will not only result in hiding your status from others, but you won\'t also be able to see others\' status within your certain range. Are you still sure to continue?
Notice! Activating "Map Status" will result in making your location visible to others. Please be sure about it before turning on.
Only the users within your 5KM radius distance are visible to you if their Map Status in ON.
The app will be locked after each time you choose and you need to unlock it at the beginning.
If enabled, you can take screenshots of the app, but the system will display your chats in the task switcher even when the passcode is on. You may need to restart the app for this to take effect.

When you set a passcode, a lock icon will appear on top of the main chats page. Tap it to lock or unlock the app. \nNote: you can set only numbers as a PIN or a combination of numbers and letters as a Password with no restriction. \nIf you forget your passcode, you just need to log out once and log in again with no need to enter the PIN/Password.
If you have forgotten your PIN/Password, there is no way to recover but only to log out and log in again. Are you sure to log out?
The passcode must contain at least 4 numbers and/or letters.

array.name: onboard_descriptions
array.item: With Wallet you dont need to carry cash or physical card anymore.
In stores or taxis or everywhere else that has Wallet, you can scan their QR and pay them easily.

resources.string: Wallet password sent to you. (The password will expire after 2 minutes, please change it after retrieving it)

Please select one of the below options:
Please enter your account recovery keys.
By using these words, you will be able to retrieve your account.

There is no existing account in Kuknos.
Please enter your account seed key.
By using this key, you will be able to retrieve your account.
Your seed key\'s length is not long enough.
Your seed key must start with S.
If you would like to continue, please accept terms and conditions
Username\'s Character must be a to z and numbers. It must be at least 5 characters
All of the below keywords are case sensitive. Please make sure you write down and save your recovery phrase. You will need this phrase to restore your wallet.
Okay, I have written it down.
Your key stream length is not long enough.
Here is all of the information related to your account in Kuknos platform.
This key is for you to share with others in order to get currencies from them.
This key is private and with this key, you can access to your account and restore your wallet. Please be notified that this key MUST not be shared with others.
This 4 numeric PIN will be used for future login and confirmations. Please make sure you choose a PIN that is difficult to guess for others.
Please re-enter your selected PIN code.
Your PIN code does NOT match.
For receiving credit from others, you must send your wallet ID to others.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Wallet Address must not be empty.
Amount format is wrong. please only use . and digits.
The connection to server is lost. Please try again in a few moments.
This 4-numeric PIN will used to encrypt your secret keys. Please make sure you choose a PIN that is difficult to guess for others.
Current PIN must NOT be empty.
New PIN must NOT be empty.
Re-enter new PIN to verify it.
New and confirm PIN does Not match.
The connection to server is lost. Please try again in a few moments.
Please enter your PIN to view your recovery phrase.
Current PIN must NOT be empty.
PIN code is wrong. Please try again.

Warning: loging out from your wallet will wipe the information from this machine. To view your wallet, you will have to go through the restoration process again.\n(If you have not set pin code, just enter 0000)
Kuknus is a multi-token platform that provides issues of any assets. In Kuknos platform we have an assets called %1$s.

PS:
 - Rest of the assets in kuknus is valuated by this Paymon
 - Since Paymon has been backed by gold (one unit of PMN is equal to 30 mg 24-karat gold)
 - will be used as transactions fee
 - Consider as a gauge for assessing minimum balances
Number of %1$s can NOT be empty.
Number of %1$s can NOT be zero.

Bank payment servers are not responding. Please try again in a few moments.

Please be notified: this is the only key that you can use to access your account later. Do NOT share it with others.

Be informed:

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.
